text: Approval for two electrical design changes for the lifevest wearabledefibrillator 4000 monitor pulse delivery circuitry. these changes include and increase the values of four dc blocking capacitors on the defibrillator pca and two bulk capacitors on the monitor computer/analog (c/a) board, as well as change the dc blocking capacitor dielectric from y5v to x7r and the addition of ferrite bead to the battery power wire on the c/a board. the device, as modified, will be marketed under the trade name lifevest wearable defibrillator 4000 and is indicated for adult patientswho are at risk for sudden cardiac arrest and are not candidates for or refuse an implantable defibrillator.
